author: gawor
msg: AXIS2-4984: Use a property to force to use the post web method rules. Patch from Ivan. Also cleaned up the code a bit and removed unused private functions

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1501: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1501. Namespace declarations may have been added by namespace fix-up. If the "namespace-declarations" parameter has been set to false we need to fetch the AttributeMap again if it contained no attributes prior to namespace fix-up.

author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing JIRA Issue #1501: http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1501. Namespace declarations may have been added by namespace fix-up. If the "namespace-declarations" parameter has been set to false we need to fetch the AttributeMap again if it contained no attributes prior to namespace fix-up.
